name: DeleteBoardFrame
description:
Delete a frame from a specified board.

Use this tool to delete a frame from a Miro board by specifying the board ID and frame item ID. This action requires the 'boards:write' scope. Ideal for managing board content by removing unnecessary frames.

parameters.name: board_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the board from which the frame will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the frame.

parameters.name: frame_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the frame to be deleted from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to delete.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the frame.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the frame.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to delete.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the frame that you want to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
